actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

actions.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 107-734.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 458.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on capital losses applicable to individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase, from $3,000 to $8,250, the annual capital loss limit applicable to individuals. Provides for an annual inflation adjustment.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on capital losses applicable to individuals.
